alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango; Cortland; Otsego; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 8:08PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Otsego, northwestern Broome, southern Cortland, northeastern Tioga and northern Chenango Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 808 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Marathon, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Norwich, Virgil, Oxford, Richford, Solon, Cincinnatus, Preston, Willet, Whitney Point and Harford. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 8 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
